$interpreted: Tica: ... If so, please forward this package to Mrs. Patricia.
Tica: Remember to emphasize that this is personally delivered by Rune Academy Headmaster Charle Ceres~~~~ 's student, Miss Tica Chevalier~
Sharice: Get outta my way!
Sharice: Hey, I need the help of a royal sorcerer. Just call whoever is free right now!

Tica: Ehhhh, Tica was the first one here.
If you have business to deal with, you have to get in line~
Sharice: Mine's an emergency! I need a rune sorcerer to help me with this letter right now. I'm sure you won't mind waiting a minute!
Tica: What you have is a letter with a rune drawn on it, right?
Sharice: You know that by just looking at it? So you're a rune sorcerer?
Tica: Teehee, I am a student of Rune Academy~
Tica: If that's the case, how 'bout I help you handle your issue. That way, you won't have to cut in line!
Sharice: What, so you're just a student? Then don't bother. I don't have time to mess around with brats. Wait until you graduate, then we can talk.
Tica: Do you not want my help because you're embarrassed to ask me?
Sharice: T, that's not what I was thinking!
Tica: I know! Then I'll take it from you with force! That way, you won't feel embarrassed anymore~
Sharice: What!?
Tica: Here I come. Get ready! On your mark, get set, GOOO~!

Tica: Ouch! That hurt... I give up!
You can't attack someone who has tapped out; it's in the rules!
Sharice: Hmph, in the end, still an immature student...
Tica: NOW!
Tica: Yeah~ I got the letter~
Sharice: That doesn't count. You cheated!
Tica: Hehehe, It's called "adapting to the situation~"
Tica: After all, I've been running errands for Headmaster Ceres for quite some time already. I've accumulated plenty of experience along the way~
Sharice: Shut it! Give me back the letter! I will not forgive you if you damage it!
Tica: Ehh, but this rune was already damaged...
Tica: Lemme see if I can fix it~
Tica: It's done~
Sharice: That was fast!
Tica: Hmmm... so you have a younger brother?
Sharice: ... More or less. Our age differs quite a bit.
Tica: Ah, so for a long time, you were the only child of your family?
Sharice: ......
Sharice: Hey, wait a minute. Who said you could read the letter!?

Tica: The letter says that your younger brother is sick.
Your father wants you to come back and say your final goodbyes.
Sharice: WHAT!?
Tica: The letter also said that your brother's illness is a very obscure one. It can only be cured by obtaining
Tica: the tail scales of the mysterious mermaids. Legend has it that this species can only be found on the borders of the East Alliance.
Sharice: ... A mermaid, you said!?
Tica: That's what the letter's saying. However, Tica has never seen a mermaid in her life...
Tica: Do you have an idea where you can find a mermaid?
Sharice: ... I...

Model.Text: ... If so, please forward this package to Mrs. Patricia.
Remember to emphasize that this is personally delivered by Rune Academy Headmaster Charle Ceres~~~~ 's student, Miss Tica Chevalier~
Get outta my way!
Hey, I need the help of a royal sorcerer. Just call whoever is free right now!

Ehhhh, Tica was the first one here.
If you have business to deal with, you have to get in line~
Mine's an emergency! I need a rune sorcerer to help me with this letter right now. I'm sure you won't mind waiting a minute!
What you have is a letter with a rune drawn on it, right?
You know that by just looking at it? So you're a rune sorcerer?
Teehee, I am a student of Rune Academy~
If that's the case, how 'bout I help you handle your issue. That way, you won't have to cut in line!
What, so you're just a student? Then don't bother. I don't have time to mess around with brats. Wait until you graduate, then we can talk.
Do you not want my help because you're embarrassed to ask me?
T, that's not what I was thinking!
I know! Then I'll take it from you with force! That way, you won't feel embarrassed anymore~
What!?
Here I come. Get ready! On your mark, get set, GOOO~!

Ouch! That hurt... I give up!
You can't attack someone who has tapped out; it's in the rules!
Hmph, in the end, still an immature student...
NOW!
Yeah~ I got the letter~
That doesn't count. You cheated!
Hehehe, It's called "adapting to the situation~"
After all, I've been running errands for Headmaster Ceres for quite some time already. I've accumulated plenty of experience along the way~
Shut it! Give me back the letter! I will not forgive you if you damage it!
Ehh, but this rune was already damaged...
Lemme see if I can fix it~
It's done~
That was fast!
Hmmm... so you have a younger brother?
... More or less. Our age differs quite a bit.
Ah, so for a long time, you were the only child of your family?
Hey, wait a minute. Who said you could read the letter!?

The letter says that your younger brother is sick.
Your father wants you to come back and say your final goodbyes.
WHAT!?
The letter also said that your brother's illness is a very obscure one. It can only be cured by obtaining
the tail scales of the mysterious mermaids. Legend has it that this species can only be found on the borders of the East Alliance.
... A mermaid, you said!?
That's what the letter's saying. However, Tica has never seen a mermaid in her life...
Do you have an idea where you can find a mermaid?
